mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INGREDIENT (category, name, name_eng, sale, inventory, sale_status, flavor, explanation, photo) VALUES(#{category}, #{name}, #{name_eng}, #{sale}, #{inventory}, #{sale_status}, #{flavor}, #{explanation}, #{photo})
mapper.select:
SELECT ingredient_id as id, category, name, name_eng, sale, inventory, sale_status, flavor, explanation FROM INGREDIENT WHERE 1=1
AND category = #{category}
mapper.update: UPDATE INGREDIENT SET category = IFNULL(#{category}, category), name = IFNULL(#{name}, name), name_eng = IFNULL(#{name_eng}, nameEng), sale = IFNULL(#{sale}, sale}), inventory = IFNULL(#{inventory}, inventory}), sale_status = IFNULL(#{sale_status}, sale_status}), flavor = IFNULL(#{flavor}, flavor), explanation = IFNULL(#{explanation}, explanation), photo = IFNULL(#{photo}, photo) WHERE 1=1 AND ingredient_id = #{id}
